reviewText: This movie was purchased for its age and style.  To that, it more than lived up to its expectation.  It plays slowly compared to todays movies, and some sections are a bit racist and immoral by todays standards.  The gadgetry I expected wasn't there but the acting was very good. and the overall of the movie was excellent!

c.tait pour un de mes amis qui n'a pas d'ordinateur. Il a ador sauf qu'il y a seulement le premier pisode en franais (audio)le reste est en anglais dommage avec la technologie d'aujourd'hui c'est si simple d'ajout le franais.
